answers.answer: Make an appointment to see your doctor urgently, or phone the doctor to do a home visit if you are too ill to go to the surgery.
Have you been using the restroom to urinate more and more? Does it go away if you eat something? you may have diabetes. You need to see a doctor.
You might want to get bloodwork to check your iron, vitamin B12 and vitamin D levels.

question: i have been having really bad pain through out my body and it has been accompanied by shakiness, drowsiness, weakness and dizziness and i have been losing weight when i haven't been trying to and i don't know why.
title: i've been feelng weird
